saintsdragons.gui.dragon_ally.title: Dragon Ally Management
saintsdragons.tooltip.dragon_ally_book.l: Right-click on your dragon to manage allies
Allies won't be hurt by dragon attacks
Supports up to 10 allies per dragon
saintsdragons.tooltip.stegonaut_binder.d: §e§lA steadfast core. Strength radiates quietly within.§r§r
saintsdragons.tooltip.stegonaut_binder.e: Right-click on a tamed Stegonaut to bind it
saintsdragons.tooltip.stegonaut_binder.r: Right-click on ground to release bound drake
saintsdragons.tooltip.raevyx_binder.empt: Right-click on a tamed Raevyx to bind it
saintsdragons.tooltip.raevyx_binder.righ: Right-click on ground to release bound wyvern
Right-click on ground to release bound wyvern
§6The wind hums within, restless yet graceful.§r
Right-click on a tamed Cindervane to bind it
Right-click on ground to release bound Cindervane
Right-click on ground to release bound Cindervane
saintsdragons.tooltip.nulljaw.descriptio: §lA shard of the abyss hums quietly inside.§r
saintsdragons.tooltip.nulljaw.empty: Right-click on a tamed Nulljaw to bind it
saintsdragons.tooltip.nulljaw.right_clic: Right-click on ground to release bound Nulljaw
Right-click on ground to release bound Nulljaw
saintsdragons.message.stegonaut_cannot_b: This drake cannot be bound right now
saintsdragons.message.binder_already_occ: This binder already contains a drake
saintsdragons.message.binder_not_bound: This binder is empty - bind a drake first
saintsdragons.message.dragon_cannot_be_c: This dragon cannot be bound right now
saintsdragons.message.cannot_release_oth: You can only release dragons you own
saintsdragons.message.raevyx_already_occ: This binder already contains a Raevyx
saintsdragons.message.nulljaw_cannot_be_: This Nulljaw cannot be bound right now
advancement.saintsdragons.tame_raevyx_fe: Tame a female Raevyx. Again, ZEUS. WHO.
advancement.saintsdragons.tame_cindervan: Tame a Cindervane, now you own a tactical nuke with wings. Great insurance.
advancement.saintsdragons.tame_nulljaw.d: Tame a Nulljaw, the abyss that bites back. Good job!
advancement.saintsdragons.tame_stegonaut: Win over the Stegonaut with a single fish.
saintsdragons.ui.control.title: Dragon Controls
commands.dragonally.add.description: Add a player as an ally to a dragon
commands.dragonally.remove.description: Remove a player as an ally from a dragon
commands.dragonally.list.description: List all allies of a dragon

entity.saintsdragons.raevyx.breeding_coo: %s is not ready to breed yet
entity.saintsdragons.stegonaut.fed_parti: %s is being healed... (you must love this thing to even heal it)
saintsdragons.message.ally.invalid_usern: Invalid username! Must be 3-16 characters, letters/numbers/underscores only, and appropriate content
saintsdragons.message.ally.player_not_fo: Who is %s? Are you sure you're playing with that person?
saintsdragons.message.ally.ally_limit_re: Maximum ally limit reached (10 allies max)
saintsdragons.message.ally.is_owner: Must you try? You are the owner of this dragon.
saintsdragons.message.easter_egg.notch: Yes, he created this game. But he's not on this server!
saintsdragons.message.easter_egg.jeb_: The lead developer! But he's busy working on the next update.
saintsdragons.message.easter_egg.dinnerb: The developer who makes everything upside down! But he's not here.
saintsdragons.message.easter_egg.grumm: Another Minecraft developer! But he's not on this server.
saintsdragons.message.easter_egg.herobri: Do not turn around. You're not supposed to be here.
entity.saintsdragons.cindervane.passenge: The owner needs to mount it first before you can do it.
entity.saintsdragons.cindervane.seats_fu: Sorry, but the seats are full.
